name: Penguns
description:
A local co-op multiplayer where you and a buddy are a pair of penguins chained together and stuck in a bullet hell.

One penguin with a bucket can catch bullets, and the other with a gun shoots them, work together to survive as long as possible.

Controls:

Bucket Penguin:

WASD
E or Space to catch bullets

Gun Penguin:

Arrows
Mouse to shoot

Made for Kiwijam 2022.
